meanings.definition: The quality or state of being delicious or tasty.
meanings.sent1: The yumminesses of the freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen with a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't resist the yumminesses of the chocolate cake at the party.
meanings.sent3: The yumminesses of the ice cream made everyone smile with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always brings out the yumminesses of every dish she prepares.
meanings.sent5: The bakery displayed an array of yumminesses that tempted customers to indulge.

meanings.sent1: The dessert menu offered various yumminesses for us to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The bakery specializes in creating different yumminesses for its customers.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with yumminesses for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The buffet was a treasure trove of yumminesses waiting to be savored.
meanings.sent5: The food festival showcased a wide selection of yumminesses for food enthusiasts.
